Blog.post: Well, I just started this blog, but I guess I'll add any random crap I can up onto this, right? How do I add images? Blah...

Okay. Didn't do much today. Stayed home, played some WC3. And god, I should stop playing that on Battle.net, actually, just the custom games. People are morons. It's like walking into the cesspool of idiocy. Seriously, if you ever get the chance to check it out, I don't know whether to advise you to stay away, or to at to prove I'm not bullshitting you. That place is awful. Games are bad too, tower defenses, defense of the ancients, I mean, some games aren't bad, but try some variety, ya? It gets boring playing the same thing over and over with the handfull of idiots who spout shit like, "yo lik wtfl ol god dude noob"

urlLink Picture of my taru character from Final Fantasy XI. I used to use this to kick it with my friend, Christian in-game. But now I just use it to play on whenever I'm extremely bored. Which doesn't happen often now. urlLink
urlLink Another Lil' John photoshopped thing. This is my mock-up flyer for Lil' John's latest album. :D Rawrl, laugh. urlLink

urlLink It's Lil' John.. or is it? urlLink It's a picture I edited, of Animal from the muppets, what more do you want? Oh, why I did it? It's hillarious. Plus I think Lil' John is animal. Look at that picture, then try arguing with me. Yeah, that's right. YOU CAN'T . Can't argue with facts my friend.

urlLink Alright. This is another recent comic that I made. I guess you won't get much unless I do the "commentary." urlLink Okay. The story behind this is that there was this one idiot on Battle.net. What a surprise, right? Yeah, right. Anyways. This guy, goes on and on about how he hates niggers, and how he's going to burn us, even though me and my friend aren't black. Then this idiot keeps rambling about how he makes 70 thousand a year, and he's 20 years old. Frankly? I think this guy must be 12, I hope. Or else this leaves little hope for planet Earth if morons like these will inhabit it. Jesus. Just imagine this guy making 70 thousand dollars a year, talking about that stupid shit. I barely noticed I didn't actually describe what's going on with the comics. Well ... I been watching the Surreal Life recently, that's been on Vh1 and has all these old school celebrities and stuff. Mix that in with the above story, and you got yourself a stupid story. There.
urlLink El comic muy chistoso que se trate de mi amigo Christian y los locos de la pelicula, Pulp Fiction. ^_^ urlLink

Aggh... I accidentally deleted this post, and now I have to rewrite it. So let me rewrite it. Me and my friend Hunter, had this sprite comic thing going on last summer, and we made some funny comics and all, but then we stopped. Recently though... it has started up again! That's right. So check it out, and I'll post whatever we come up with, whether it's stupid, stupid-funny, not-stupid-funny, or just plain not funny. If you're here, you might as well read the crap I got to say? Right? No. . . Then. . . :(
Ah, I'm scared of this. I'll add some stuff. Like.. stuff like, comics, things on my mind.. and uh, pictures maybe? Yes! Pictures.
urlLink What if... Lil' Jon was Animal? And what if Animal was Lil' Jon? Well folks, here you have it. Check it out. urlLink
urlLink This is my first comic since work has resumed. urlLink
urlLink Okay. This is another comic. Sprite comic. Yeah. Anyways, this is about.. two things. The Surreal Life, and an idiot on Battle.net. urlLink

urlLink I hope this works. Using a new blog. urlLink Alright. This comic is about my favorite movie (Pulp Fiction), and my friend (Not favorite). jk jk Anyways, yeah. It's an "homage," "parody," whatever you want to call it, about one of the scenes in the movies. I thought it was funny. It's stupid, but yeah. Funny?

Alright, first post. Not really, I just recreated from the old one, because well, the title didn't really fit. Anyways... I'll be moving the stuff over, and my friend will also add stuff, and post stuff, whatever.

No one reads this shit, but if someone did, Luis got mouth surgery or some shit and probably won't make a comic for a while. I made the last comic, so until he's made another, I've reached my quota, bitches.
Rick James is dead. :( Let the mourning begin.
urlLink MTV Cribs goes to Christian's house. urlLink
urlLink Run run and run! urlLink
